user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Secure Login
epics.summary: Develop a secure multi-factor authentication login system for the portal.
epics.description: Implement a robust authentication system that supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) including one-time passwords, biometric verification, and device-based trust. Ensure encryption of credentials, secure token handling, and compliance with banking security standards. This feature will establish a strong foundation for secure user access and protect against unauthorized login attempts.

epics.title: Responsive and User-Friendly Interface
epics.summary: Design a responsive portal interface for web and mobile access.
epics.description: Develop a modern and intuitive portal interface that adapts seamlessly to various devices such as desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. The interface should maintain consistent functionality and visual design across platforms, ensuring accessibility, ease of navigation, and compliance with WCAG standards for inclusivity and ease of use.

epics.title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Implement a dynamic dashboard with personalized content.
epics.description: Create a personalized dashboard that displays user-specific data such as account summaries, eligible services, and relevant product offerings. The system should use customer profiles and banking eligibility information to curate the displayed options, enhancing the relevance and efficiency of the user experience.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflow
epics.summary: Build simplified workflows for account and service management.
epics.description: Develop digital workflows to allow customers to open new accounts and request service modifications directly from the portal. These workflows must minimize the number of steps required, guide users through validations, and ensure seamless interaction between the UI and backend systems. The process should include confirmation screens, automatic data validation, and contextual help to reduce friction.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Status and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status tracking and notification features.
epics.description: Implement a real-time status tracking system for all user-submitted requests, enabling customers to monitor progress. Configure automated email and in-app notifications for key milestones such as submission, review, and completion. The system should use event-driven architecture to update statuses and enhance transparency for users.

epics.title: Secure Document Upload and Draft Saving
epics.summary: Allow users to upload necessary documents and save drafts.
epics.description: Provide functionality for secure document uploads required for account openings and service modifications. Enable users to save incomplete applications as drafts, allowing them to resume later. Uploaded files and saved data must be encrypted and stored in compliance with data protection policies, ensuring safe transmission and retrieval.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank's core systems.
epics.description: Build integration layers to connect the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s existing core banking infrastructure. Real-time synchronization should ensure consistent customer data and transaction information across systems. Integration must be secure, highly performant, and capable of interfacing with APIs or existing middleware solutions for seamless data exchange.

epics.title: Role-Based Access and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement role-based access control for secure feature visibility.
epics.description: Design a robust role-based access control (RBAC) system allowing different user roles to access only the services relevant to their credentials and authorization level. Provide administrative configuration tools for role management, access auditing, and ongoing compliance checks to maintain secure separation of privileges.

epics.title: Audit Trail and Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain detailed logs of all user interactions securely.
epics.description: Develop an audit trail feature that records all user actions such as logins, submissions, document uploads, and data modifications. Logs must be tamper-proof, secure, and compliant with financial regulatory requirements. Provide authorized auditors and administrators with query and reporting capabilities for monitoring user activities and ensuring integrity.

epics.title: Performance, Scalability, and Reliability Optimization
epics.summary: Ensure high performance, scalability, and uptime of the portal.
epics.description: Optimize system performance with load balancing, caching, and asynchronous data processing. Implement monitoring and alerting mechanisms to proactively address latency or downtime. The system architecture must be scalable to handle increasing user loads while maintaining fast response times and high availability in production environments.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication system
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a secure multi-factor authentication system, so that I can safely access the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must support one-time passwords, biometric verification, and device-based trust. Ensure encryption of credentials and secure token handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when logging in, then the system must prompt for multiple authentication factors
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they provide the first authentication factor, then the system must prompt for a second factor

user_stories.title: Design responsive portal interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive portal interface, so that I can access it on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The interface should adapt to various devices and comply with WCAG standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when accessing the portal on different devices, then the interface should adapt seamlessly
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when accessing the portal on a mobile phone, then the interface should be mobile-friendly

user_stories.title: Implement personalized dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant account information and service options.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should use customer profiles to display relevant data and services.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when accessing their dashboard, then it should display user-specific data and services
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when their profile changes, then the displayed dashboard data should update accordingly

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.title: Develop digital workflows for account and service management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless account opening and service modification workflows, so that I can manage my account efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows must minimize steps, guide users through validations, and ensure seamless UI-backend interaction.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when requesting a new account or service modification, then the workflow should guide them with validations
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they complete workflow steps, then confirmation screens should appear

user_stories.title: Provide real-time status tracking and notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time request status tracking, so that I can monitor the progress of my submissions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system should provide real-time updates and automated notifications for key milestones.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when submitting a request, then they should receive real-time status updates
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when a request milestone is reached, then they should receive a notification

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Document Upload and Draft Saving
user_stories.title: Enable secure document upload and draft saving
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely upload documents and save drafts, so that I can complete applications at a later time.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Uploaded documents and saved data must be encrypted and stored securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when uploading documents, then the process should be secure
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when saving a draft, then they should be able to resume it later

user_stories.title: Integrate self-service portal with the bank's core systems
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless integration with the core banking system, so that my data is always synchronized.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration must be secure, performant, and capable of real-time synchronization.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when their data changes, then it should be updated across all systems in real-time
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when making a transaction, then it should sync with the core banking system

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want role-based access control, so that users can only see features relevant to their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide tools for role management, access auditing, and compliance checks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given an administrator, when managing roles, then they should be able to configure access levels
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific role, when accessing the portal, then they should only see allowed features

user_stories.title: Develop audit trail feature
user_stories.description: As an auditor, I want detailed logs of user interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and integrity.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Logs must be tamper-proof and compliant with financial regulations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given a user, when performing actions, then all interactions should be securely logged
user_stories.test_cases: Given an auditor, when querying logs, then they should be able to retrieve detailed interaction history

user_stories.title: Ensure high performance, scalability, and uptime
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want the portal to be highly performant, scalable, and reliable, so that users have a seamless experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement load balancing, caching, monitoring, and alerting mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Given increasing user load, when accessing the portal, then the system should maintain fast response times
user_stories.test_cases: Given a system alert, when a performance issue is detected, then it should trigger corrective actions

architecture_generation.description: This architecture shows the banking self-service portal using various Azure services for frontend, authentication, backend services, database, integration, notifications, monitoring, security, access control, and DevOps, ensuring user-friendly design, security, and seamless integration.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability gaps by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and placeholder nodes for disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, and the structure adheres to ReactFlow standards with no missing or duplicate elements. The architecture now better aligns with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, achieving a high-quality rating.
